original_text: Jesus then said, ‘At one time, there was a rich man who wore very expensive clothes. This rich man ate big meals every day.
korean_text: 한 부자가 있어 자색 옷과 고운 베옷을 입고 날마다 호화롭게 즐기더라

sentences.original_text: At one time, there was a rich man
This rich man ate big meals every day
sentences.korean_translation: 이 부자는 매일 큰 식사를 했습니다
